member.name: M:CMS.SharePoint.SharePointFileInfoProvider.UpdateFile(CMS.SharePoint.SharePointFileInfo,System.IO.Stream,System.String)
member.summary: Updates file in SharePoint library with new content and name. The can be the same as the old one. The updated file is immediately available both on the SharePoint server and locally in the library.
member.param: SharePoint file to be updated.
Stream containing the new file's binary content.
File name of the updated file.
member.exception: Thrown when identifies an already existing file within the library.
Thrown when file identified by does not exist on SharePoint server.
Thrown when the SharePoint library has no valid connection defined.
Thrown in case of unexpected error condition.

member.name: M:CMS.SharePoint.SharePointFileInfoProvider.DeleteFile(CMS.SharePoint.SharePointFileInfo)
member.summary: Deletes the specified file on the SharePoint server and from the local library. Deleting a non-existent file within SharePoint library (i.e. file is out of sync) deletes the file from the local library as well.
member.param: SharePoint file to be deleted
member.exception: Thrown when the SharePoint library has no valid connection defined.
Thrown in case of unexpected error condition.

member.name: M:CMS.SharePoint.SharePointFileInfoProvider.RecycleFile(CMS.SharePoint.SharePointFileInfo)
member.summary: Moves the specified file to the recycle bin of the SharePoint server. Deletes the file from the local library. Returns the identifier of the new recycle bin item on SharePoint. Recycling a non-existent file within SharePoint library (i.e. file is out of sync) returns empty GUID and deletes the file from the local library as well.
member.param: SharePoint file to be recycled on the SharePoint server
member.returns: GUID of the new recycle bin item on SharePoint, or when file does not exist.
member.exception: Thrown when the SharePoint library has no valid connection defined.
Thrown in case of unexpected error condition.

member.name: M:CMS.SharePoint.SharePointLibraryHelper.CreateSharePointFiles(CMS.SharePoint.SharePointLibraryInfo,CMS.SharePoint.ISharePointFileService,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.Data.DataRow})
member.summary: Creates local representation of SharePoint files from a list containing DataRow items describing each file. The fields "FileRef" and "Modified" of each DataRow must be specified. All necessary data is retrieved from the SharePoint server using . Since the library content can change during the processing of all files, files which are not found on SharePoint are skipped, files which are found in local library are not being added again.
member.param: SharePoint library in which to store the files.
SharePoint file service used for files retrieval.
Enumeration of data rows representing files to be added.
member.exception: Thrown when requested file is not present at SharePoint server.
Thrown whenever server error occurs.
Thrown when error related to network or protocol occurs.
Thrown when given connectionData contains unsupported authentication mode or invalid URL.
Thrown in case of unexpected error condition.

member.name: M:CMS.SharePoint.SharePointLibraryHelper.CreateSharePointFile(CMS.SharePoint.SharePointLibraryInfo,CMS.SharePoint.ISharePointFileService,System.String,System.DateTime)
member.summary: Creates local representation of SharePoint file from its server relative URL and last modification time. Returns true if the file has been created. Returns false if the file is already present in the library.
member.param: SharePoint library in which to store the file.
SharePoint file service used for file retrieval.
Server relative URL of created file.
Last modification time of the file - taken from the corresponding list item, not directly from the file's metadata.
member.returns: True on successful file creation, false if the file already exists in the library.
member.exception: Thrown when requested file is not present at SharePoint server.
Thrown whenever server error occurs.
Thrown when error related to network or protocol occurs.
Thrown when given connectionData contains unsupported authentication mode or invalid URL.
Thrown in case of unexpected error condition.
member.remarks: The newly created file does not use the last modification time from the file's metadata, because it can not be retrieved in one query for multiple files. Therefore future library synchronization would be ineffective.

In order for the selection to be valid the , and should be provided.

member.summary: Provides access to the collection of <View> element attributes. Attributes which are not contained in the collection have their default meaning. Access to some attributes is provided via short hand properties.
member.remarks: For informational list of possible attributes see http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/office/ms438338(v=office.14).aspx Please note that the actual recognized attributes are service type and version dependent and each implementing may handle them differently.

member.name: P:CMS.SharePoint.SharePointView.Scope
member.summary: Gets or sets the Scope attribute value. Null value removes the attribute (keeping it default). Typical values are FilesOnly (show only the files of a specific folder), Recursive (show all files of all folders) or RecursiveAll (show all files and all subfolders of all folders). The default lists only files and subfolders of a specific folder.

summary.para: Gets a selection of items of a SharePoint list identified by its title. Keeping or unspecified causes all items (optionally restricted by ) to be selected. Keeping unspecified causes all list items to be selected (the still applies).

The parameter is provided just for comfortability reason and produces a query similar to the following
<Query> <And> <Eq><FieldRef Name="" /><Value Type=""></Value></Eq> </And> </Query>
The DataSet has an empty table (with no columns) if no list items are retrieved.

member.param: SharePoint list title
Relative URL of listed folder (if list supports subfolders). Keep blank for root listing.
Configuration options for list items retrieval.
Constraint for selection of certain items.
member.returns: DataSet containing DataTable with list items.
member.exception: Thrown whenever server error occurs.
Thrown when error related to network or protocol occurs.
Thrown when given connectionData contains unsupported authentication mode or invalid URL.
Thrown in case of unexpected error condition.
member.remarks: The value of parameter folderServerRelativeUrl can originate from FileRef column of parent folder items listing. To determine whether an item is a folder, check the FSObjType column's value equality to 1.
